Load 2024_CSN_Data_Contributors.csv trimming blank lines, detects the true header row, keeps only the contiguous data block.

Convert every cell to numeric when possible—removing commas and dollar signs, and expanding K (×1,000) or M (×1,000,000) suffixes—to ensure '# of Reports' and other numeric columns are proper numbers.
Select rows whose Year is between 2022 and 2024 (inclusive).
Select rows whose 'Data Contributor' string matches 'FTC - Web Reports (Fraud & Other)'.
Sum the '# of Reports' column for the rows that meet both conditions to obtain the total number of FTC web-reported fraud cases over 2022-2024.
